short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse between Steam related websites for any game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows basic information about any Steam game get by Steam Spy requests in vidget:
- Release Date
- Owners Number
- Followers Number
- Current Price
- Current Concurrent Players Number

Additionally allows to switch between Steam related websites.
